root.name: Alan Probe: Amateur Surgeon
root.description: Controls To play amateur surgeon you need to master some important game mechanics. To make an incision you must choose the pizza cutter and cut on the yellow line not missing any of the little lines otherwise resulting in a miss, loss of a combo and also hurting the patient. To patch up an incision pick up your stapler and staple the cut about 3 to 5 times until a note comes up telling you it is ready for heat and following that is the pain cream which heal the wound completely. To take things out of the body you must pick the salad tongs and place you finger on the cut. You slowly pull out the item until the pan shows up on the screen. To cut harder objects like a rib cage you use the chainsaw. Just like the pizza cutter you have a dotted line to cut. Finally to bring you patient back from cardiac arrest you use the car battery.
